Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the role played by Donald Trump in funding the Veterans Day parade in 1995. He donated $200,000, which was less than 10% of the total raised.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that Donald Trump did make a contribution to the parade, but it was not the sole source of funding.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting an inaccurate portrayal of Donald Trump's involvement in financing the parade.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to substantiate the assertion that the City of New York refused to fund the parade.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Donald Trump single-handedly financed the Veterans Day parade.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the funding of the parade, such as contributions from other businesses and organizations.
